contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish2|[[Y0 (disambiguation)]] (Y followed by zero)}} {{Wiktionarypar|yo}} '''[[Yo]]''' is an interjection meaning "hello" or "hey". {{TOCright}} '''Yo''' may also refer to: ==Language== * [[Yo (Cyrillic)]] (Ё, ё), a letter of the Cyrillic alphabet * [[Yo (kana)]], the romanisation of the Japanese kana よ and ヨ * The Spanish [[Spanish pronouns|first person nominative pronoun]] * ISO 639-1 code for the [[Yoruba language]], a dialect continuum of western Africa ==Music== * [[Yö]], Finnish rock band * "[[Yo (Excuse Me Miss)]]", a song by Chris Brown * ''[[Yo! MTV Raps]]'', a television show featuring rap music, later renamed as Yo! * "YO", an instrumental song [[List of songs recorded by Linkin Park|by Linkin Park]] from ''LP Underground 11'' ==Other uses== * [[Yō]], Japanese given name * [[Master Yo]], the fictional character from the Disney/Jetix show ''Yin Yang Yo!'' * [[YO postcode area]], England * A roll of 11 in the game of [[craps]] == See also == * [[Yoism]], an open source religion * [[Yo-yo (disambiguation)]] * [[Whyos]], slang for mobsters {{disambig}}
